content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":260932,"originalJapaneseLine":"　都市長の中には、魔人側に内通している裏切り者かもしれんし、それに一度大敗しているじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Among the city mayors, there might be a traitor who is conspiring with the demons, and besides, haven't they already suffered a major defeat once?"},{"lineNumber":260933,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一度ケチがついているのは事実だ。罷免すべきだと言う者も何人かいるらしい","translatedEnglishLine":"It's true that they've already got a stain on their record once. Apparently, some people are saying they should be dismissed."},{"lineNumber":260934,"originalJapaneseLine":"　実は、開戦時から即流れた噂なんだが、魔軍側が誰か主要人物を調略しており、いわば裏切り者を作っていると・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Actually, there's been a rumor circulating since the start of the war that the demon army has bribed some key person, in other words, creating a traitor..."},{"lineNumber":260935,"originalJapaneseLine":"　都市長の誰かとも言われているが・・魔人の元から無事に返されたセシルが当然１番疑われている","translatedEnglishLine":"They say it might be one of the city mayors... but Cecil, who was safely returned from the demons, is naturally the most suspected."},{"lineNumber":260936,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス、それは無い。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, that's not possible."},{"lineNumber":260937,"originalJapaneseLine":"　また、美人だからってすぐに信じるのはどうかと思うよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, I think it's questionable to believe someone just because they're beautiful."},{"lineNumber":260938,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、裏切り者・・別、おっと・・それは内緒だ","translatedEnglishLine":"No, traitor... something else... oh, that's a secret."},{"lineNumber":260939,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんしろセシルちゃんではない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, it's not Cecil-chan."},{"lineNumber":260940,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しかし、勇者テオマンとも何かあるようだし、魔人レイとも何かあるか・・ミステリアスな女だ、魅力的だ。とランス","translatedEnglishLine":"However, it seems she has something going on with the hero Teoman, and also something with the demon Rei... she's a mysterious woman, attractive. Says Rance."},{"lineNumber":260941,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260942,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　ポイント","translatedEnglishLine":"Points"},{"lineNumber":260943,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　　セシルが多くの人に不審がられて孤立している","translatedEnglishLine":"Cecil is being suspected by many people and is isolated."},{"lineNumber":260944,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　　自由都市連合に裏切り者疑惑の噂が飛び交っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Rumors of a traitor suspicion are flying around in the Free City Union."},{"lineNumber":260945,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　　ランスは情報をすでに掴んでいる（犯人＝カチューシャ","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance has already grasped the information (the culprit = Katyusha)"},{"lineNumber":260946,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、魔軍","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the demon army"},{"lineNumber":260947,"originalJapaneseLine":"大将軍ピサロは落ち着いていた、大規模な攻勢をかける事はない","translatedEnglishLine":"Generalissimo Pizarro was calm; he was not going to launch a large-scale offensive."},{"lineNumber":260948,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦いで我らの優秀へ兵士を傷付ける必要は無い","translatedEnglishLine":"There is no need to injure our excellent soldiers in battle."},{"lineNumber":260949,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間共を利用しないとなと、コンバートがぺこぺこ","translatedEnglishLine":"We have to make use of the humans, Convert said with a bow."},{"lineNumber":260950,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レイ、魔人パイアールには、今は戦わないようにとお願いしている","translatedEnglishLine":"He has asked demon Rei and demon Paiar not to fight for now."},{"lineNumber":260951,"originalJapaneseLine":"実はあまり戦わせたくない、手柄はピサロが全て取りたいから","translatedEnglishLine":"Actually, he doesn't want them to fight much because Pizarro wants to take all the credit himself."},{"lineNumber":260952,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイは不満そうだが、人間の女や、特一級の女の子モンスターを与えいるのでそれが気晴らしになっているだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"Rei seems dissatisfied, but since he has been given human women and top-tier female monsters, that probably serves as a distraction."},{"lineNumber":260953,"originalJapaneseLine":"コンバート、作戦の準備はほぼ整いました。","translatedEnglishLine":"Convert: The preparations for the operation are almost complete."},{"lineNumber":260954,"originalJapaneseLine":"私が苦労して人類側の内通者との連絡をしてきたので完璧ですよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I struggled to establish contact with the human side's traitor, so it's perfect."},{"lineNumber":260955,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、ただ本作戦前にひとつ、すごい手土産が入りそうですよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, but before this operation, we might receive a fantastic gift."},{"lineNumber":260956,"originalJapaneseLine":"これがうまくいけば自由都市方面でけでなく全人類地域を落とせます","translatedEnglishLine":"If this goes well, not only the Free City area but the entire human territory can be captured."},{"lineNumber":260957,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランド","translatedEnglishLine":"M Land"},{"lineNumber":260958,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人が出てこないな、捜しても見つからないし","translatedEnglishLine":"The demons aren't appearing; even searching, they can't be found."},{"lineNumber":260959,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様の貴重な時間をここで浪費する訳にもいかないか、いったんランス城に戻って","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't waste my precious time here; I'll return to Rance Castle for now,"},{"lineNumber":260960,"originalJapaneseLine":"他の地域での魔人退治を先にした方がいいかもしれないと引き上げようとしていると","translatedEnglishLine":"thinking it might be better to exterminate demons in other regions first, and as he was about to withdraw,"},{"lineNumber":260961,"originalJapaneseLine":"（なんとなくしらじらしいランスの行動）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Somewhat feigning innocence in Rance's behavior)"},{"lineNumber":260962,"originalJapaneseLine":"カチューシャが現れる、えっ、もう帰られるのですか、待って下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Katyusha appears: \"Eh, are you already leaving? Please wait.\""},{"lineNumber":260963,"originalJapaneseLine":"予定より早いがしかたないと心の中で思いつつランスを誘う","translatedEnglishLine":"Though it’s earlier than planned, she thought to herself it can’t be helped, and invited Rance."},{"lineNumber":260964,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260965,"originalJapaneseLine":"カチューシャがランスに計略をかける","translatedEnglishLine":"Katyusha sets a trap for Rance."},{"lineNumber":260966,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスを見込んで話がある、とある方に会って頂きたい","translatedEnglishLine":"She trusts Rance and says she has something to discuss; wants him to meet a certain person."},{"lineNumber":260967,"originalJapaneseLine":"すごい美女も用意していますのでとか誘うと","translatedEnglishLine":"She tempts him with the promise of a stunning beauty prepared."},{"lineNumber":260968,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはしかたないなぁと乗ってきます","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance reluctantly agrees and goes along."},{"lineNumber":260969,"originalJapaneseLine":"（カチューシャはランスの籠絡には自信があるが、ランスが帰るまでに誘わないと","translatedEnglishLine":"(Katyusha is confident in seducing Rance but is a bit rushed to invite him before he leaves)"},{"lineNumber":260970,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いけないので少し焦っている","translatedEnglishLine":"So she is slightly flustered."},{"lineNumber":260971,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスは実は知っているので余裕がある）","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, however, actually knows about it and is relaxed.)"},{"lineNumber":260972,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260973,"originalJapaneseLine":"秘密の会談の場所、カチューシャはＭランド北の小さな町でといったが","translatedEnglishLine":"For the secret meeting place, Katyusha said it would be a small town north of M Land,"},{"lineNumber":260974,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは、それは方角が悪い、俺はいきたくないと断る","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance refused, saying that’s the wrong direction and he doesn’t want to go."},{"lineNumber":260975,"originalJapaneseLine":"なら、ジフテリアではどうしょうかというと","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, when she suggested Jiphtheria,"},{"lineNumber":260976,"originalJapaneseLine":"遠い、行きたくないとかわがまま言う","translatedEnglishLine":"He selfishly says it's too far and he doesn't want to go."},{"lineNumber":260977,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだな、このＭランドが１番いいのだが、それは・・ちょっとカチューシャ","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, M Land is the best, but that’s... a bit, Katyusha,"},{"lineNumber":260978,"originalJapaneseLine":"（さすがに人類軍の本拠地はまずいと）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Surely the human army’s stronghold is a no-go.)"},{"lineNumber":260979,"originalJapaneseLine":"なら、しかたないな、このゴアという町はどうだと","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, he said, \"Well then, how about this town called Gore?\""},{"lineNumber":260980,"originalJapaneseLine":"さも適当に決めたとい言わんばかりにその町を指差す","translatedEnglishLine":"He pointed to that town as if he had decided arbitrarily."},{"lineNumber":260981,"originalJapaneseLine":"それでしたらと・・とカチューシャも応じる","translatedEnglishLine":"Katyusha also agreed, saying \"If that's the case...\""},{"lineNumber":260982,"originalJapaneseLine":"では今夜、このゴアの町にしよう、ここで会おう","translatedEnglishLine":"Then let's meet tonight in this town of Gore."},{"lineNumber":260983,"originalJapaneseLine":"最後に意味深にクレインとか出す","translatedEnglishLine":"At the end, she cryptically mentions Crane or something."},{"lineNumber":260984,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゴアの町","translatedEnglishLine":"Town of Gore"},{"lineNumber":260985,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス側は事前に罠を察知して施設を友軍で固めた","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance's side sensed the trap in advance and fortified the facilities with allied forces."},{"lineNumber":260986,"originalJapaneseLine":"会談に現れたの、コンバート、カチューシャ","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who appeared at the meeting were Convert and Katyusha."},{"lineNumber":260987,"originalJapaneseLine":"今の戦いは人類は絶対に勝てない、勝つ方につきませんか","translatedEnglishLine":"Humanity can never win this current battle; won’t you side with the winners?"},{"lineNumber":260988,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物に支配されるはまっぴらだ","translatedEnglishLine":"I absolutely refuse to be ruled by monsters."},{"lineNumber":260989,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界の支配権、人類を管理する役職を約束しましょう。","translatedEnglishLine":"We promise you the authority to rule the world and the position to manage humanity."},{"lineNumber":260990,"originalJapaneseLine":"メモ　コンバートはランスは彼を知らない","translatedEnglishLine":"Note: Rance does not know Convert."},{"lineNumber":260991,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様が魔人側についたら人類地域の統治の責任者にしてもらえるそうです。","translatedEnglishLine":"If Lord Rance sides with the demons, he will be made the governor of human territories."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市長の中には、魔人側に内通している裏切り者かもしれんし、それに一度大敗しているじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the city mayors, there might be a traitor who is conspiring with the demons, and besides, haven't they already suffered a major defeat once?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度ケチがついているのは事実だ。罷免すべきだと言う者も何人かいるらしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's true that they've already got a stain on their record once. Apparently, some people are saying they should be dismissed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実は、開戦時から即流れた噂なんだが、魔軍側が誰か主要人物を調略しており、いわば裏切り者を作っていると・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, there's been a rumor circulating since the start of the war that the demon army has bribed some key person, in other words, creating a traitor...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市長の誰かとも言われているが・・魔人の元から無事に返されたセシルが当然１番疑われている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say it might be one of the city mayors... but Cecil, who was safely returned from the demons, is naturally the most suspected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、それは無い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, that's not possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また、美人だからってすぐに信じるのはどうかと思うよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, I think it's questionable to believe someone just because they're beautiful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、裏切り者・・別、おっと・・それは内緒だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, traitor... something else... oh, that's a secret.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんしろセシルちゃんではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, it's not Cecil-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、勇者テオマンとも何かあるようだし、魔人レイとも何かあるか・・ミステリアスな女だ、魅力的だ。とランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, it seems she has something going on with the hero Teoman, and also something with the demon Rei... she's a mysterious woman, attractive. Says Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポイント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Points

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルが多くの人に不審がられて孤立している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil is being suspected by many people and is isolated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合に裏切り者疑惑の噂が飛び交っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rumors of a traitor suspicion are flying around in the Free City Union.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは情報をすでに掴んでいる（犯人＝カチューシャ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has already grasped the information (the culprit = Katyusha)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the demon army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍ピサロは落ち着いていた、大規模な攻勢をかける事はない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Generalissimo Pizarro was calm; he was not going to launch a large-scale offensive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いで我らの優秀へ兵士を傷付ける必要は無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no need to injure our excellent soldiers in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共を利用しないとなと、コンバートがぺこぺこ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to make use of the humans, Convert said with a bow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイ、魔人パイアールには、今は戦わないようにとお願いしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has asked demon Rei and demon Paiar not to fight for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実はあまり戦わせたくない、手柄はピサロが全て取りたいから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, he doesn't want them to fight much because Pizarro wants to take all the credit himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイは不満そうだが、人間の女や、特一級の女の子モンスターを与えいるのでそれが気晴らしになっているだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei seems dissatisfied, but since he has been given human women and top-tier female monsters, that probably serves as a distraction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンバート、作戦の準備はほぼ整いました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Convert: The preparations for the operation are almost complete.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が苦労して人類側の内通者との連絡をしてきたので完璧ですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I struggled to establish contact with the human side's traitor, so it's perfect.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、ただ本作戦前にひとつ、すごい手土産が入りそうですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, but before this operation, we might receive a fantastic gift.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これがうまくいけば自由都市方面でけでなく全人類地域を落とせます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this goes well, not only the Free City area but the entire human territory can be captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M Land

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人が出てこないな、捜しても見つからないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demons aren't appearing; even searching, they can't be found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の貴重な時間をここで浪費する訳にもいかないか、いったんランス城に戻って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't waste my precious time here; I'll return to Rance Castle for now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の地域での魔人退治を先にした方がいいかもしれないと引き上げようとしていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thinking it might be better to exterminate demons in other regions first, and as he was about to withdraw,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （なんとなくしらじらしいランスの行動）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Somewhat feigning innocence in Rance's behavior)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャが現れる、えっ、もう帰られるのですか、待って下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha appears: "Eh, are you already leaving? Please wait."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 予定より早いがしかたないと心の中で思いつつランスを誘う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it’s earlier than planned, she thought to herself it can’t be helped, and invited Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャがランスに計略をかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha sets a trap for Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを見込んで話がある、とある方に会って頂きたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She trusts Rance and says she has something to discuss; wants him to meet a certain person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい美女も用意していますのでとか誘うと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She tempts him with the promise of a stunning beauty prepared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはしかたないなぁと乗ってきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance reluctantly agrees and goes along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （カチューシャはランスの籠絡には自信があるが、ランスが帰るまでに誘わないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Katyusha is confident in seducing Rance but is a bit rushed to invite him before he leaves)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いけないので少し焦っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So she is slightly flustered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは実は知っているので余裕がある）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, however, actually knows about it and is relaxed.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 秘密の会談の場所、カチューシャはＭランド北の小さな町でといったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For the secret meeting place, Katyusha said it would be a small town north of M Land,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、それは方角が悪い、俺はいきたくないと断る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance refused, saying that’s the wrong direction and he doesn’t want to go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、ジフテリアではどうしょうかというと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, when she suggested Jiphtheria,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠い、行きたくないとかわがまま言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He selfishly says it's too far and he doesn't want to go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、このＭランドが１番いいのだが、それは・・ちょっとカチューシャ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, M Land is the best, but that’s... a bit, Katyusha,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （さすがに人類軍の本拠地はまずいと）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Surely the human army’s stronghold is a no-go.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、しかたないな、このゴアという町はどうだと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, he said, "Well then, how about this town called Gore?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さも適当に決めたとい言わんばかりにその町を指差す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He pointed to that town as if he had decided arbitrarily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでしたらと・・とカチューシャも応じる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha also agreed, saying "If that's the case..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では今夜、このゴアの町にしよう、ここで会おう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then let's meet tonight in this town of Gore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後に意味深にクレインとか出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the end, she cryptically mentions Crane or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゴアの町
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Town of Gore

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス側は事前に罠を察知して施設を友軍で固めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's side sensed the trap in advance and fortified the facilities with allied forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会談に現れたの、コンバート、カチューシャ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who appeared at the meeting were Convert and Katyusha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の戦いは人類は絶対に勝てない、勝つ方につきませんか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humanity can never win this current battle; won’t you side with the winners?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物に支配されるはまっぴらだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I absolutely refuse to be ruled by monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の支配権、人類を管理する役職を約束しましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We promise you the authority to rule the world and the position to manage humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモ　コンバートはランスは彼を知らない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note: Rance does not know Convert.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様が魔人側についたら人類地域の統治の責任者にしてもらえるそうです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Lord Rance sides with the demons, he will be made the governor of human territories.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

he was not going to launch a large-scale offensive."},{"lineNumber":260948,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦いで我らの優秀へ兵士を傷付ける必要は無い","translatedEnglishLine":"There is no need to injure our excellent soldiers in battle."},{"lineNumber":260949,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間共を利用しないとなと、コンバートがぺこぺこ","translatedEnglishLine":"We have to make use of the humans, Convert said with a bow."},{"lineNumber":260950,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レイ、魔人パイアールには、今は戦わないようにとお願いしている","translatedEnglishLine":"He has asked demon Rei and demon Paiar not to fight for now."},{"lineNumber":260951,"originalJapaneseLine":"実はあまり戦わせたくない、手柄はピサロが全て取りたいから","translatedEnglishLine":"Actually, he doesn't want them to fight much because Pizarro wants to take all the credit himself."},{"lineNumber":260952,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイは不満そうだが、人間の女や、特一級の女の子モンスターを与えいるのでそれが気晴らしになっているだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"Rei seems dissatisfied, but since he has been given human women and top-tier female monsters, that probably serves as a distraction."},{"lineNumber":260953,"originalJapaneseLine":"コンバート、作戦の準備はほぼ整いました。","translatedEnglishLine":"Convert: The preparations for the operation are almost complete."},{"lineNumber":260954,"originalJapaneseLine":"私が苦労して人類側の内通者との連絡をしてきたので完璧ですよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I struggled to establish contact with the human side's traitor, so it's perfect."},{"lineNumber":260955,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、ただ本作戦前にひとつ、すごい手土産が入りそうですよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, but before this operation, we might receive a fantastic gift."},{"lineNumber":260956,"originalJapaneseLine":"これがうまくいけば自由都市方面でけでなく全人類地域を落とせます","translatedEnglishLine":"If this goes well, not only the Free City area but the entire human territory can be captured."},{"lineNumber":260957,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランド","translatedEnglishLine":"M Land"},{"lineNumber":260958,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人が出てこないな、捜しても見つからないし","translatedEnglishLine":"The demons aren't appearing; even searching, they can't be found."},{"lineNumber":260959,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様の貴重な時間をここで浪費する訳にもいかないか、いったんランス城に戻って","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't waste my precious time here; I'll return to Rance Castle for now,"},{"lineNumber":260960,"originalJapaneseLine":"他の地域での魔人退治を先にした方がいいかもしれないと引き上げようとしていると","translatedEnglishLine":"thinking it might be better to exterminate demons in other regions first, and as he was about to withdraw,"},{"lineNumber":260961,"originalJapaneseLine":"（なんとなくしらじらしいランスの行動）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Somewhat feigning innocence in Rance's behavior)"},{"lineNumber":260962,"originalJapaneseLine":"カチューシャが現れる、えっ、もう帰られるのですか、待って下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Katyusha appears: \"Eh, are you already leaving? Please wait.\""},{"lineNumber":260963,"originalJapaneseLine":"予定より早いがしかたないと心の中で思いつつランスを誘う","translatedEnglishLine":"Though it’s earlier than planned, she thought to herself it can’t be helped, and he leaves)"},{"lineNumber":260970,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いけないので少し焦っている","translatedEnglishLine":"So she is slightly relaxed.)"},{"lineNumber":260972,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260973,"originalJapaneseLine":"秘密の会談の場所、カチューシャはＭランド北の小さな町でといったが","translatedEnglishLine":"For the secret meeting place, Katyusha said it would be a small town north of M Land,"},{"lineNumber":260974,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは、それは方角が悪い、俺はいきたくないと断る","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance refused, saying territories."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市長の中には、魔人側に内通している裏切り者かもしれんし、それに一度大敗しているじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the city mayors, there might be a traitor who is conspiring with the demons, and besides, haven't they already suffered a major defeat once?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度ケチがついているのは事実だ。罷免すべきだと言う者も何人かいるらしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's true that they've already got a stain on their record once. Apparently, some people are saying they should be dismissed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実は、開戦時から即流れた噂なんだが、魔軍側が誰か主要人物を調略しており、いわば裏切り者を作っていると・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, there's been a rumor circulating since the start of the war that the demon army has bribed some key person, in other words, creating a traitor...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市長の誰かとも言われているが・・魔人の元から無事に返されたセシルが当然１番疑われている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say it might be one of the city mayors... but Cecil, who was safely returned from the demons, is naturally the most suspected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、それは無い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, that's not possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また、美人だからってすぐに信じるのはどうかと思うよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, I think it's questionable to believe someone just because they're beautiful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、裏切り者・・別、おっと・・それは内緒だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, traitor... something else... oh, that's a secret.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんしろセシルちゃんではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, it's not Cecil-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、勇者テオマンとも何かあるようだし、魔人レイとも何かあるか・・ミステリアスな女だ、魅力的だ。とランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, it seems she has something going on with the hero Teoman, and also something with the demon Rei... she's a mysterious woman, attractive. Says Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポイント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Points

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルが多くの人に不審がられて孤立している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil is being suspected by many people and is isolated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合に裏切り者疑惑の噂が飛び交っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rumors of a traitor suspicion are flying around in the Free City Union.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは情報をすでに掴んでいる（犯人＝カチューシャ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has already grasped the information (the culprit = Katyusha)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the demon army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍ピサロは落ち着いていた、大規模な攻勢をかける事はない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Generalissimo Pizarro was calm; he was not going to launch a large-scale offensive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いで我らの優秀へ兵士を傷付ける必要は無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no need to injure our excellent soldiers in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間共を利用しないとなと、コンバートがぺこぺこ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to make use of the humans, Convert said with a bow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイ、魔人パイアールには、今は戦わないようにとお願いしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has asked demon Rei and demon Paiar not to fight for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実はあまり戦わせたくない、手柄はピサロが全て取りたいから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, he doesn't want them to fight much because Pizarro wants to take all the credit himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイは不満そうだが、人間の女や、特一級の女の子モンスターを与えいるのでそれが気晴らしになっているだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei seems dissatisfied, but since he has been given human women and top-tier female monsters, that probably serves as a distraction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンバート、作戦の準備はほぼ整いました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Convert: The preparations for the operation are almost complete.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が苦労して人類側の内通者との連絡をしてきたので完璧ですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I struggled to establish contact with the human side's traitor, so it's perfect.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、ただ本作戦前にひとつ、すごい手土産が入りそうですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, but before this operation, we might receive a fantastic gift.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これがうまくいけば自由都市方面でけでなく全人類地域を落とせます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this goes well, not only the Free City area but the entire human territory can be captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M Land

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人が出てこないな、捜しても見つからないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demons aren't appearing; even searching, they can't be found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の貴重な時間をここで浪費する訳にもいかないか、いったんランス城に戻って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't waste my precious time here; I'll return to Rance Castle for now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の地域での魔人退治を先にした方がいいかもしれないと引き上げようとしていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thinking it might be better to exterminate demons in other regions first, and as he was about to withdraw,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （なんとなくしらじらしいランスの行動）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Somewhat feigning innocence in Rance's behavior)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャが現れる、えっ、もう帰られるのですか、待って下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha appears: "Eh, are you already leaving? Please wait."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 予定より早いがしかたないと心の中で思いつつランスを誘う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it’s earlier than planned, she thought to herself it can’t be helped, and invited Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャがランスに計略をかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha sets a trap for Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを見込んで話がある、とある方に会って頂きたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She trusts Rance and says she has something to discuss; wants him to meet a certain person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい美女も用意していますのでとか誘うと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She tempts him with the promise of a stunning beauty prepared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはしかたないなぁと乗ってきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance reluctantly agrees and goes along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （カチューシャはランスの籠絡には自信があるが、ランスが帰るまでに誘わないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Katyusha is confident in seducing Rance but is a bit rushed to invite him before he leaves)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いけないので少し焦っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So she is slightly flustered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは実は知っているので余裕がある）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, however, actually knows about it and is relaxed.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 秘密の会談の場所、カチューシャはＭランド北の小さな町でといったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For the secret meeting place, Katyusha said it would be a small town north of M Land,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、それは方角が悪い、俺はいきたくないと断る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance refused, saying that’s the wrong direction and he doesn’t want to go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、ジフテリアではどうしょうかというと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, when she suggested Jiphtheria,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠い、行きたくないとかわがまま言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He selfishly says it's too far and he doesn't want to go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、このＭランドが１番いいのだが、それは・・ちょっとカチューシャ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, M Land is the best, but that’s... a bit, Katyusha,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （さすがに人類軍の本拠地はまずいと）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Surely the human army’s stronghold is a no-go.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、しかたないな、このゴアという町はどうだと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, he said, "Well then, how about this town called Gore?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さも適当に決めたとい言わんばかりにその町を指差す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He pointed to that town as if he had decided arbitrarily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでしたらと・・とカチューシャも応じる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha also agreed, saying "If that's the case..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では今夜、このゴアの町にしよう、ここで会おう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then let's meet tonight in this town of Gore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後に意味深にクレインとか出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the end, she cryptically mentions Crane or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゴアの町
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Town of Gore

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス側は事前に罠を察知して施設を友軍で固めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's side sensed the trap in advance and fortified the facilities with allied forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会談に現れたの、コンバート、カチューシャ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who appeared at the meeting were Convert and Katyusha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の戦いは人類は絶対に勝てない、勝つ方につきませんか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humanity can never win this current battle; won’t you side with the winners?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物に支配されるはまっぴらだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I absolutely refuse to be ruled by monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の支配権、人類を管理する役職を約束しましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We promise you the authority to rule the world and the position to manage humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモ　コンバートはランスは彼を知らない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note: Rance does not know Convert.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様が魔人側についたら人類地域の統治の責任者にしてもらえるそうです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Lord Rance sides with the demons, he will be made the governor of human territories.
